amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the President's Manufacturing Council.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 13 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce by $50,000 the amount provided in the bill for the Commerce Department's management expenses and increases it by the same amount, resulting in no change in funding levels.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kucinich amendment (A008) Agreed to by recorded vote: 232 - 186 (Roll no. 332).
